head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GRAHAM, HELEN FRANCES

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GRAHAM, HELEN FRANCES

block.p: GRAHAM-Helen Frances. On July 29, 2000. Devoted wife of the late Dr. Arthur V. Beloved mother of Maryjane, Arthur V., Jr and Angela, James and Sue, John and Leslie. Cherished grandmother of Deborah, Arthur III and Allison, MaryEllen, James Jr., and Rosa, Paul and Wendy, Joseph, John and Delfina, Edward. Dear great grandmother of Timothy. Funeral Wednesday, 9:15 AM from Marine Park Funeral Home, 3024 Quentin Road, Bklyn. Mass St. Edmund's R.C. Church, 10:15 AM. Interment Calvary Cemetery. Visiting hours from 2-5 and 7-10 PM today.
